description: A green powder that creates artificial rain by accelerating ice particle formation in sub-freezing clouds. Cannot create new water, only redistributes existing rainfall from one area to another, causing droughts in neighboring regions.

keyMoments.title: Dance Powder Explained in Detail
keyMoments.description: Vivi and Nami provide comprehensive explanation of Dance Powder's mechanics, history, and role in Arabasta's crisis.
keyMoments.significance: Central plot device of the Arabasta Arc, key to understanding Crocodile's scheme

keyMoments.title: Dance Powder and the King's Miracle
keyMoments.description: Revelation that Dance Powder was allegedly used in Alubarna to create the 'King's Miracle' while other regions suffered drought.
keyMoments.significance: Explains how Crocodile manipulated public opinion against King Cobra

keyMoments.title: Dance Powder's Origin and World Government Ban
keyMoments.description: Explanation of how Dance Powder was created by a rain-deprived nation but caused war due to induced droughts, leading to a World Government ban punishable by death.
keyMoments.significance: Provides historical context and shows the severity of using Dance Powder

properties.effect: Creates artificial rainfall by accelerating ice particle formation in clouds
properties.limitation: Cannot create new water; only redistributes existing rainfall, causing droughts in other areas
properties.method: Burned to create vapor that is released into the air

legalStatus.reason: Caused devastating war between nations due to induced droughts

historicalSignificance: Originally created by a rain-deprived nation to bring joy through rainfall. Named for the happiness ('dance with joy') it would bring. However, its use caused droughts in neighboring regions, sparking a war with massive casualties.

currentUse.purpose: Crocodile's organization secretly used Dance Powder to frame King Cobra, making it appear he was favoring Alubarna with rain while other regions suffered drought

culturalReferences: Based on real-world cloud seeding technology using silver iodide

reveals.information: Dance Powder works by accelerating ice particle creation in sub-freezing clouds to produce rapid heavy rainfall
Cannot create new water, only redistributes rainfall from one area to another
Banned by the World Government under penalty of death due to wars it caused
Allegedly used by King Cobra to favor Alubarna with rain (actually part of Crocodile's frame-up)
